turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, at which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the Starbucks at 45 West 4th Street, in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an Iced Gingerbread Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like them to make it light and remove the whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of milk in that then?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like them to use skim milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will place that order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I'm sorry, I changed my mind, can I get a tall skim Chai instead?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like them to add an expresso shot in the Chai, ask them for a tall dirty Skim Chai. I've gotten one in the past before.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem, I'll place that order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great, and my receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be sent to your phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order will be ready for pick up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a nice day.
